English:
Now what?
Huh? Rie's Heart-Wrenching Diary?
Chinese:
這次又是什麼啦？
嗯？「里繪的心怦怦日記」？
German:
Was denn jetzt?
Wie? „Ries herzzereißendes Tagebuch“?

English:
All right, let's see what you've got...
...
German:
So, dann wollen wir mal sehen ...
...

English:
It looks like the contents are encrypted.
It can't be. This is the confidential library?
Chinese:
內容好像被加密了，
該不會……這就是最高機密的函式庫？
Korean:
안쪽은 암호화되어 있는 모양이구만
설마… 이게 극비 정보의 라이브러리라는 거야?
German:
Der Inhalt ist wohl verschlüsselt.
Das kann doch nicht sein! Wir sind doch schon
im vertraulichen Bereich!

English:
Come in! This is the secret room search squad!
Hey, y'all! This is Dendenken Ramen!
This is Arata's Neighborhood Watch.
Chinese:
你好！這裡是機密屋搜查隊！
您好！這裡是電電軒拉麵店！
這裡是“守護新搜索民宅協會”！
Korean:
네! 이쪽은 비밀의 방 수색대!
매번 감사합니다! 라~면 가게 덴덴켄입니다!
이쪽은, "아라타 군의 집 안 수색을 지켜보는 모임"입니다
German:
Hier ist der Geheimraum-Suchtrupp!
Guten Tag, was darf’s für eine Pizza sein?
Hier ist Aratas Nachbarschaftswache!

Chinese: 發生什麼事了嗎？杏子姊！
Korean: 무슨 일 있었던 거야, 쿄코 씨!?

English: It seems there was a disturbance at the preview.
Chinese: 更新體驗會上好像發生騷動了。
German:
Offenbar gab es einen Vorfall beim Schnupper-
Event.

English:
A disturbance? What's that supposed to mean?
At the preview venue?
Chinese:
騷動？怎麼了？
體驗會的會場嗎？
German:
Einen Vorfall? Was heißt das denn?
Im Event-Raum?
